Synopsis: Selects data from an in-memory database
Description: Selects data from System.Data.Datatable, which is an in-memory database

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$dt = dir | Select Name, LastWriteTime, LastAccessTime, CreationTime |  ConvertTo-DataTable 
Select-DataTable -DataTable $dt -Sort LastWriteTime -SortOrder Descending
